Ola Teige (ola.teige@iakh.uio.no) is postdoctoral research fellow at the Institutt for arkeo­logi, konservering og historie (the Department of Archaeology, Conservation, and History), Universitetet i Oslo. His main research interest is Scandinavian social, military, and political history c. 1660–1850, especially corruption and the social networks of the elites
